biodiversity areas.
36. If the undertaking has identified material impacts with regards to land-use change, or impacts
on the extent and condition of ecosystems, it may also disclose their land-use based on a Life
Cycle Assessment.
37. For datapoints specified in paragraphs 38 to 41, the undertaking shall consider its own
operations.
